attributes.action: Next year minutes silence for Bradford Fire disaster
attributes.additional_details: For there to be a minutes silence across the country for the Bradford Fire which took 56 innocent lives. Nothing was said or done about it on the last game of the season, yet when it is the Hillsborough and Munich disaster black arm bands, seats left empty and a minutes silence across the country is performed to show respect. I think the same needs to be shown towards the Bradford Fire disaster!

rejection.details: One for the football authorities to decide upon.
